text:
@realDonaldTrump We have to call crazy when we read crazy....
There are 3.304,942 total cases of Corona and 135,205 deaths in the USA and you ly about Obama's golfing more than you? GO YOU BACK TO YOUR DESK have #DrFauci back on TV to inform us about the #coronavirus instead of you about golf... https://t.co/SzdvAaN1xM

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
